title: 10 Countries in Asia Pacific with the largest number of Christians in 2010
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Estimated Christian population in millions in each Country on the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
Country Burma (Myanmar) has 22.9 times less Estimated Christian population in millions than Country Philippines which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Christian population in millions in the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Estimated Christian population in millions in each Country on the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
Country Burma (Myanmar) has 22.9 times less Estimated Christian population in millions than Country Philippines which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Estimated Christian population in millions in the y axis.
The Estimated Christian population in millions is appeared to be the highest at Country Philippines and lowest at Country Burma (Myanmar).
Country Burma (Myanmar) has 22.9 times less Estimated Christian population in millions than Country Philippines which is the highest.
Estimated Christian population in millions at Country Philippines is 86.79 , second place is China at 67.07, and thirdly is India at 31.85.
The lowest value 3.79 at Burma (Myanmar) is almost 3.35 times smaller than the average value 25.88.
